author: trawick
msg: un-rearrange some of the header file includes
there is an interdependency between apr_allocator.h and
apr_pools.h that must be resolved before the order
prior to this commit, Apache's exports.c could fail to
compile when building with an out-of-tree APR because
the order of inclusion in that case exposed the problem

author: jorton
msg: Eliminate a local variable in apr_unix_file_cleanup.

author: jorton
msg: Fix the 'test_buffered_write_size' test by ensuring that buffered
files are flushed before calling fstat.

author: jorton
msg: Make apr_file_inherit_set/unset work for pipes created by Unix
Submitted by: Joe Orton, Bjoern A. Zeeb <bzeeb-lists@lists.zabbadoz.net>
